about.title: About Edelweiss Tokio
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Insurance Partner Since 2005
about.content: Edelweiss Tokio Life Insurance is a joint venture between Edelweiss Financial Services and Tokio Marine Group, Japan's oldest insurance company. With over 2 decades of experience and a 98% claim satisfaction rate, we've protected millions of families and businesses across India.
about.mission: Our mission is to make insurance simple, accessible, and trustworthy through transparent policies and exceptional customer service.

projects.title: Flood Damage Recovery
projects.description: Processed ₹10 Lakhs home insurance claim within 72 hours during Kerala floods
projects.testimonial: Edelweiss Tokio helped us rebuild when everything was lost. Their support team was available 24/7 during the crisis.

projects.title: Family Financial Security
projects.description: Secured ₹50 Lakhs for a family within 7 days of policyholder's demise
projects.testimonial: The claim settlement gave us financial stability during our toughest time. Thank you for your compassion.

projects.title: Medical Emergency Support
projects.description: Approved ₹2.5 Lakhs for emergency surgery within 24 hours
projects.testimonial: Cashless hospitalization and immediate claim processing made our medical emergency manageable.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common insurance questions

items.question: How long does the claim process take?
items.answer: Most claims are processed within 7-10 working days. For emergency situations like health crises or natural disasters, we have a fast-track process that settles claims within 72 hours.

items.question: Can I customize my insurance policy?
items.answer: Yes, we offer flexible riders and add-ons to customize your policy. Our advisors will help you build a plan that matches your specific needs and budget.

items.question: What documents are needed for claims?
items.answer: Required documents vary by claim type. Generally, you'll need the claim form, identity proof, policy documents, and incident-specific evidence. Our app guides you through the exact requirements for your claim.

items.question: How do premium payments work?
items.answer: You can pay premiums annually, semi-annually, quarterly, or monthly through multiple channels including online payments, auto-debit, UPI, and cheque.
